channel.title: When you can't get to the the truckfest... (featuring teh bootneckjohan_)
channel.description:
The truckfest comes to you!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DPuzjDnq2YE
Well our nextdoor neighbour decided to bring down 8 trucks from the 2009 shepton mallet truckfest down to good old bovington! I havn't seen this many people in the street at once for a long time! Nothing usally happens here but yeah thought you might like to see me as well! They stopped for a cuppa for 5 minutes.
Enjoy :D
(And yes, teh bootneckjohan_ is a ginger!)

[quote=“casey., post:6, topic:287308”]so interesting is trucks driving down the street honking their horns.

that’s not homo[/quote]

It’s not very interesting but other than this nothing happens around here…
